name: Jolly Holiday Adventure
description:
The holiday season is upon us again. And it is your task to help Jonny spread the joy and of course the gifts to the people of the town. Get ready for a Jolly Adventure that will get you in the holiday spirit.

System Requirements:

OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more Storage: 100 MB available space
